seo.title: Luggage storage options in Positano
seo.description: Where to store bags in Positano, hours, pricing expectations, and alternatives.

intro: Where to store luggage in Positano: options near the dock and along Via dei Mulini.

sections.title: Near the dock
body: Hourly/daily storage with ticket; expect queues in high season — book ahead if possible.

sections.title: Aggregators
body: Bounce / Radical Storage: verify exact address and opening hours before paying online.

sections.title: Etiquette & tips
body: Keep valuables with you; label bags clearly; take a photo of claim tickets.

a: Hours vary; check for early closing off‑season and last ferry times.

heroAlt: Porter guiding a luggage cart up Positano's steps
